name: Kram
description:
A game where you are not alone when picking upgrades and downgrades.
My submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2!

Story

In a futuristic apocalypse, where all plants have died, because of rams that had been eating every plant to ever photosynthesized, You, a killing machine have to kill them all before they eat all of the remaining plants. Everytime you kill incoming rams, you can upgrade yourself, however there was a bug in your programming which picks a random downgrade for you.

Controls
  • W or Up - Moves the player up
  • A or Left - Moves the player to the left
  • S or Down - Moves the player down
  • D or Right - Moves the player to the right
  • Space or Left Click - Shoots to the direction of the mouse pointer
